disobedience.question: Was I disobedient to my children in their time of need?

disobedience.question: Did I reject the unity of the Church when considering my own differences with other Catholics?

disobedience.question: Did I mock the Church through my words?

blasphemy.question: Did you swear at God in anger, frustration, or when feeling overwhelmed?
blasphemy.description: This sin violates the Second Commandment by treating God's holy name with disrespect rather than reverence.

blasphemy.question: Did I receive Holy Communion in my heart, being fully aware of my sinfulness and unworthiness to partake in this sacrament?
blasphemy.description: This mortal sin is a form of sacrilege and profanes the real presence of Christ and shows grave disrespect for the sacrament by receiving unworthily.

ambition.question: Did I allow my desire for power and dominance to influence my decisions in my family life, potentially causing me to prioritize control over humility and service?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: over the well - being of others
ambition.question: Did I allow my desire for power and dominance to influence my decisions, potentially leading me to prioritize my own interests over the well-being of others in relationships or professional settings?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: particularly in situations where I felt like I needed to assert control or authority
ambition.question: Did I let my desire for power and dominance influence how I interacted with those around me, particularly in situations where I felt like I needed to assert control or authority?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

extracted_data_phrases: perhaps through my words or actions
by exercising power over them in ways that were unjust or cruel
in ways that were unjust or cruel
oppression.question: Did I mistreat others, perhaps through my words or actions, by exercising power over them in ways that were unjust or cruel?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

autonomy.question: Did I take for granted the good things in my life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: in outdoor activities , sports , and career development
autonomy.question: Did I attribute my accomplishments in outdoor activities, sports, and career development solely to my own abilities, forgetting to acknowledge God's providence that enabled me?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others would be less successful in their endeavors, thereby alleviating my perceived sense of inadequacy?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in how I spoke to others
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in how I spoke to others, using words that were vulgar or inappropriate?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with words that showed a lack of self - control
incontinence.question: Did I speak to others with words that showed a lack of self-control, using language that was vulgar or inappropriate?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, neglecting my physical health and well-being?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in leisure activities beyond what was necessary
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking while engaging in leisure activities beyond what was necessary?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to an excessive attachment to worldly pleasures and a rejection of temperance?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I used excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my family's financial obligations?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: over providing for my family 's financial needs and well - being
for my family 's financial needs and well - being
prodigality.question: Have I prioritized unnecessary gambling over providing for my family's financial needs and well-being?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively indulged in wasteful spending to prioritize personal desires over my financial obligations, potentially harming my ability to provide for those in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: through casual conversations or online interactions
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what was shared was true, through casual conversations or online interactions, potentially harming their reputation for my own entertainment?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: through conversations at social gatherings or online platforms
at social gatherings or online platforms
gossip.question: Have I ever taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true, through conversations at social gatherings or online platforms?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you engage in unnecessary physical activity on a Sunday, such that it could have been avoided?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

extracted_data_phrases: in my interactions with those who have hurt me
with those who have hurt me
anger.question: Have I nursed anger or held onto feelings of rage, rather than seeking reconciliation, in my interactions with those who have hurt me?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
